mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.part AS "part", a.number AS "number", a.item AS "item", a.check_result AS "checkResult", a.process_result AS "processResult", a.assemble_id AS "assembleId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", ba.id AS "ba.id", ba.name AS "ba.name"
LEFT JOIN business_assemble ba ON ba.id = a.assemble_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sf31904_by_item( id, part, number, item, check_result, process_result, assemble_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{part}, #{number}, #{item}, #{checkResult}, #{processResult}, #{assembleId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sf31904_by_item SET part = #{part}, number = #{number}, item = #{item}, check_result = #{checkResult}, process_result = #{processResult}, assemble_id = #{assembleId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
